html: (2 Nephi 12:14-15)."All the high mountains … all the hills … every high tower, and … every fenced wall." Mention of these barriers or defenses may be an allusion to the fortifications of kings Uzziah and Jotham. (See 2 Chronicles 26:9-10; 27:3-4.) In the great and dreadful day of the Lord, such defenses will provide a false sense of security to the proud and lofty, for they will surely fall.
